name: Glass (Drayx)
description:
See how far you can descend in GLASS! Procedurally generated platforms will spawn below you. Good Luck Have Fun!

PLATFORMS WILL ONLY SPAWN ACCORDING TO THE ONE YOUR STANDING ON TIP: Go as far as you can to make sure the platforms are still reachable!

I used 2 sound effects, 1 music track from the (free) Unity Assets Store, and a free font. Everything else was made by me. 

Known Bugs:

- High score always updates to previous score, forgot the if statement :(

- Too many platforms spawn in the first ~5 levels

- Going to close to the edge without continuing will keep increasing your velocity, leading to a random burst of death, not too common.

- No Quit Button :p
